Why can super weapons only be obtained after u beat the game? If you're good enough to beat it, you wouldn't need the super weapon anyway.
Using an analogy, we can answer this question with "the rich gets richer, the poor gets poorer." however, the actual correct answer is "Because i'm your friend."
